ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games

9 using System;
10 using System.Linq;
11 using System.Collections.Generic;
12 using ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.Lib;
13 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
14 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
15 using CommandLine;
16 
17 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App
18 {
23  public class Program
24  {
25  // Exit status to return to OS
26  private static ExitStatus exitStatus;
27 
28  // Known event listeners
29  private static IDictionary<string, Type> knownThinkerListeners;
30  private static IDictionary<string, Type> knownMatchListeners;
31  private static IDictionary<string, Type> knownSessionListeners;
32 
33  // Selected event listeners
34  private static IList<IThinkerListener> selectedThinkerListeners;
35  private static IList<IMatchListener> selectedMatchListeners;
36  private static IList<ISessionListener> selectedSessionListeners;
37 
38  // Base options
39  private static bool debug;
40 
41  // Inner struct for one match sessions
42  private struct NoSessionConfig : ISessionConfig
43  {
44  public int PointsPerWin => 0;
45  public int PointsPerLoss => 0;
46  public int PointsPerDraw => 0;
47  }
48 
49  // The main method, where the ColorShapeLinks app starts
50  // The Options class defines the command line arguments accepted in
51  // the args parameter
52  private static int Main(string[] args)
53  {
54 
55  // Assume there will be an error or exception
56  exitStatus = ExitStatus.Exception;
57 
58  // Console app may throw a number of exceptions, we'll catch them
59  // here
60  try
61  {
62  // Parse command line parameters and act accordingly
63  exitStatus = Parser.Default
64  .ParseArguments<SessionOptions, MatchOptions, BaseOptions>(
65  args)
66  .MapResult(
67  (SessionOptions o) => RunSession(o, true),
68  (MatchOptions o) => RunSession(o, false),
69  (BaseOptions o) => ShowInfo(o),
70  errs => ExitStatus.Exception);
71  }
72  catch (Exception e)
73  { // An exception was thrown, deal with it
74 
75  // Should we print the full stack trace?
76  if (debug || args.Contains("-d") || args.Contains("--debug"))
77  {
78  // Yes
79 
80  // Local function to recursively print inner exception
81  // stack traces
82  void RecurseInners(Exception ie)
83  {
84  if (ie.InnerException != null)
85  RecurseInners(ie.InnerException);
86  Console.Error.WriteLine(String.Format(
87  "\n{0} ({1})\n{2}",
88  ie.GetType().Name, ie.Message, ie.StackTrace));
89  }
90 
91  // Recursively print exceptions, starting with the
92  // innermost one
93  RecurseInners(e);
94  }
95  else
96  {
97  // No full stack trace, just the basic error messages
98 
99  // Used for possible inner exceptions
100  Exception ie = e;
101 
102  // Show the exception type and message
103  Console.Error.WriteLine(
104  $"\nERROR ({e.GetType().Name}): {e.Message}");
105 
106  // If there are inner exceptions that caused this exception,
107  // show them also
108  while ((ie = ie.InnerException) != null)
109  {
110  Console.WriteLine(
111  $"\tcaused by a {ie.GetType().Name}: {ie.Message}");
112  }
113 
114  // No, but inform user on how to see the full stack trace
115  Console.Error.WriteLine(
116  "\nUse the `--debug` option to show the complete "
117  + "stack trace.\n");
118  }
119  }
120 
121  // Terminate console app with the specified exit status
122  return (int)exitStatus;
123  }
124 
125  // Run session
126  private static ExitStatus RunSession(
127  GameOptions options, bool complete)
128  {
129  // Load third-party assemblies
130  LoadAssembliesAndSelectListeners(options);
131 
132  // Initialize a session controller
133  SessionController sc = new SessionController(
134  options,
135  options is ISessionConfig
136  ? options as ISessionConfig
137  : new NoSessionConfig(),
138  options.ThinkerPrototypes,
139  selectedThinkerListeners,
140  selectedMatchListeners,
141  selectedSessionListeners);
142 
143  // Run session
144  return sc.Run(complete);
145  }
146 
147  // Show environment info (loaded assemblies, known thinkers and known
148  // listeners)
149  private static ExitStatus ShowInfo(BaseOptions options)
150  {
151  // Load third-party assemblies
152  LoadAssembliesAndSelectListeners(options);
153 
154  // Show loaded assemblies
155  Console.WriteLine("Loaded assemblies:");
156  foreach (System.Reflection.Assembly a in
157  AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())
158  {
159  Console.WriteLine($"\t{a}");
160  }
161 
162  // Show known thinkers
163  Console.WriteLine("Known thinkers:");
164  foreach (string thinkerName in ThinkerManager.Instance.ThinkerNames)
165  {
166  Console.WriteLine($"\t{thinkerName}");
167  }
168 
169  // Show known thinker listeners
170  Console.WriteLine("Known thinker listeners:");
171  foreach (string listenerName in knownThinkerListeners.Keys)
172  {
173  Console.WriteLine($"\t{listenerName}");
174  }
175 
176  // Show known match listeners
177  Console.WriteLine("Known match listeners:");
178  foreach (string listenerName in knownMatchListeners.Keys)
179  {
180  Console.WriteLine($"\t{listenerName}");
181  }
182 
183  // Show known session listeners
184  Console.WriteLine("Known session listeners:");
185  foreach (string listenerName in knownSessionListeners.Keys)
186  {
187  Console.WriteLine($"\t{listenerName}");
188  }
189 
190  return ExitStatus.Info;
191  }
192 
193 
194  // Load assemblies and select listeners
195  private static void LoadAssembliesAndSelectListeners(
196  BaseOptions options)
197  {
198  // Get debug mode from options
199  debug = options.DebugMode;
200 
201  // Load assemblies
202  foreach (string a in options.Assemblies)
203  {
204  if (a != null && a.Length > 0)
205  System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile(a);
206  }
207 
208  // Find listeners
209  knownThinkerListeners = FindListeners<IThinkerListener>();
210  knownMatchListeners = FindListeners<IMatchListener>();
211  knownSessionListeners = FindListeners<ISessionListener>();
212 
213  // Filter listeners
214  selectedThinkerListeners = new List<IThinkerListener>();
215  selectedMatchListeners = new List<IMatchListener>();
216  selectedSessionListeners = new List<ISessionListener>();
217 
218  // Will there be matches?
219  if (options is GameOptions)
220  {
221  // If so, filter thinker and match listeners so they can
222  // listen to thinkers and matches
223  GameOptions gameOptions = options as GameOptions;
224 
225  FilterListeners<IThinkerListener>(
226  gameOptions.ThinkerListeners,
227  knownThinkerListeners,
228  selectedThinkerListeners);
229 
230  FilterListeners<IMatchListener>(
231  gameOptions.MatchListeners,
232  knownMatchListeners,
233  selectedMatchListeners);
234  }
235 
236  // Will there be a session of matches?
237  if (options is SessionOptions)
238  {
239  // If so, filter session listeners so they can listen to the
240  // session
241  SessionOptions sessionOptions = options as SessionOptions;
242 
243  FilterListeners<ISessionListener>(
244  sessionOptions.SessionListeners,
245  knownSessionListeners,
246  selectedSessionListeners);
247  }
248 
249  }
250 
251  // Helper generic method to find known listeners and place them in the
252  // specified variable
253  private static IDictionary<string, Type> FindListeners<T>()
254  {
255  // Get specific listeners type
256  Type type = typeof(T);
257 
258  // Get known listeners of this type
259  return AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies()
260  .SelectMany(a => a.GetTypes())
261  .Where(t => type.IsAssignableFrom(t)
262  && !t.IsAbstract
263  && t.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes) != null)
264  .ToDictionary(t => t.FullName, t => t);
265  }
266 
267  // Helper generic method to filter listeners
268  private static void FilterListeners<T>(
269  IEnumerable<string> specified,
270  IDictionary<string, Type> known,
271  IList<T> selected)
272  {
273  // For each of the listeners specified...
274  foreach (string l in specified)
275  {
276  // Check if it's known (i.e. if it exists in the
277  // loaded assemblies)
278  if (known.ContainsKey(l))
279  {
280  // If so, instantiate it and add it to the listeners list
281  Type t = known[l];
282  selected.Add((T)Activator.CreateInstance(t));
283  }
284  else
285  {
286  // Otherwise, throw an exception
287  throw new ArgumentException(
288  $"Unknown {typeof(T).Name} listener '{l}'");
289  }
290  }
291  }
292  }
293 }
